title: Sona Still bugging out the spectate mode @Riot
body: I currently have a friend in a match who I have been spectating the past few matches to help him get better, and in this match there is a Sona. I noticed the notification was removed so I assumed I could specate, but everytime I try to connect I get a bugsplat. Riot could you please fix the bug with spectating if Sona is in the game.

replies.body:
Hey brockinroll -

This is still in the process of being resolved. Looks like the ticker was removed from the client, but you can keep track of when it's resolved by [checking out the server status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_GB#na).
Had a friend who just simply couldn't spectate a game i was in with Sona. No errors but it just wouldn't open the spectate.
